label: AppliedTax
comment: A total levy or payment for the support of a government that is required of persons, groups, or businesses within the domain of that government.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the applied tax type such as VAT.
The rate used to calculate the amount of this trade related tax, levy or duty.
The date of the tax point when taxes, such as VAT, are to be applied.

referencedBy.comment: The applied tax category of this applied allowance charge.
